Blogs.title: Cleaning River Nile
Blogs.content: The clean-up events raise awareness about the cause while engaging youth, while also generating significant exposure and visibility. Fishermen receive a financial incentive.

Blogs.title: Planting
Blogs.content: Everything we eat, including meat from animals is a result of plants using the energy in sunlight to take carbon dioxide and create complex carbon-containing molecules.

Blogs.title: Collecting Contaminants
Blogs.content: Regular cleaning and disinfecting can do a good job of removing allergens and germs, helping to prevent illnesses and promote wellness.

Blogs.title: Craft
Blogs.content: Craft materials are one of the best sustainable products that can be used to keep your environment safe and clean. This can save environment and entertain children.

Blogs.title: Garbage Sorting
Blogs.content: Waste sorting is important because it could increase the number of waste recycled later, thus, reducing the number of waste ends up in the landfill and the environment.

Blogs.title: Recycle
Blogs.content: Recycling reduces the need for extracting (mining, quarrying and logging), refining and processing raw materials all of which create substantial air and water pollution.

Blogs.title: Compost Water
Blogs.content: Compost improves downstream water quality by retaining pollutants such as heavy metals, nitrogen, phosphorus, oil and grease, fuels, herbicides, and pesticides.

Blogs.title: Homemade Art
Blogs.content: Artists who create art that utilizes the waste materials recognize the earth as beleaguered with pollution as a result of mindless consumerism.

Blogs.title: Cloth Napkin
Blogs.content: In general, cloth napkins are more sustainable because they use, considering less energy and raw materials are not used for production

Blogs.title: Seed Paper
Blogs.content: Plantable seed paper can help to beautify the environment and serve as another creative way to reduce waste and repurpose used products.

Blogs.title: Eco-Friendly Products
Blogs.content: Choose to purchase products from companies that prioritize sustainability and environmentally responsible practices. It can reduce recycling of waste products.

Blogs.title: Using Water Carefully
Blogs.content: Wasting water can be easily used for numerous things. It can be fertiliser, a source of energy, or recycled to lower carbon footprint amongst others.

Blogs.title: Public Transportation
Blogs.content: Every vehicle on the road releases an average of one pound of CO2 per mile driven. This will decrease pollutants in the atmosphere and improving air quality.

Blogs.title: Organic Food
Blogs.content: Organic food is farmed in an environmentally sustainable way. It takes a proactive approach to protect the environment and maintain the biodiversity of our planet.

Blogs.title: Turning Lighhts Off
Blogs.content: Turning off the lights when you leave your room can help save energy. It can also help reduce carbon emission and other harmful greenhouse gases.

Blogs.title: Go Digital
Blogs.content: Digital technologies can contribute to reducing global CO2 emissions by around 15% by providing a virtual environment for applications and software.
